body_content.explanation: A balky machine, device, or part of the body is not working well. :
examples: He asked a mechanic to look at the balky gearshift on his bicycle.
The midfielder had been bothered all season by a baulky right knee.

body_content.explanation: A balky person is not willing to work with or be helpful to other people:
examples: The young parents were growing frustrated trying to get their balky toddler to go to bed.
The police used clever tactics to get the baulky witness to testify.
